thread.title: Victoria Lumpkin
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Victoria Lumpkin

author: Victoria Lumpkin
title: Victoria Lumpkin
text: This was my first time buying from American Freight but I will be a returning customer! The sales person who sold us our bed and couch was very helpful. I told him what we wanted and what our budget was and he found us just what we wanted and at a great price! The deliver service was very helpful and the gentlemen who delivered the furniture were very friendly. I would recommend this place to anyone. Thank you for all your help.
